Installation instructions:

1 - Install the file "setup.exe" and wait until the installation is complete.
I recommend restarting the computer to not be any problem!
2 - After installation open the folder "Original" and install the "setup.exe ".
This will update the program to a newer version.
3 - Open the folder "Updates"and install "setupCRWDriver301PED.exe"and then "pedto712eng.exe"
After doing this process, your "PE-Design Ver7" is already with the latest version so far.
4 - Open the folder "Crack" and copy the 5 files (EmbDB.exe "," Embedit.exe "," Embfont.exe "," Embmake.exe "and" mfc71.dll ")
to the folder "C:\Program Files\Brother\PE-DESIGN Ver7", replace the original files for these and go!
You already can use the programs without having to put the CARD USB ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Â¹ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Â¹port.
